title: Dinosaur Rain Island
description: Rain wants kids, to have a hand on experience with dinosaur fossils. And so much more, at the dinosaur rain Island. Rain has been collecting Dinosaurs, ever since his first birthday on Motherâ€™s Day. Today Rain is 9 years old, and he is going into fourth grade. Rain wants to be a paleontologist, after he completes high school. A paleontologist studies dinosaur fossils. Rain Fields is very excited about, opening his very own Dinosaur Rain Island. Atlanta or Nashville
